articles.author: Chris De Silva
articles.title: Sofia Kenin admits to struggling with pressure of title defence after Australian Open exit - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: 'Nervous' reigning champ's sobering admission
articles.content:
Reigning Australian Open women's champion Sofia Kenin has broken down in tears after her stunning second-round exit at the hands of Kaia Kanepi.
